element.name: Monstrous Compendium Volume Three: Minecraft Creatures

description.p: Minecraft creepers have come to D&D, and they’re eager to detonate at your next session. This supplement brings five iconic mobs from the Minecraft game to D&D, including the blaze, creeper, ender dragon, enderman, and wolf of the overworld.

setters.set: Wizards of the Coast, Mojang Studios, D&D Beyond

element.name: Endspeech
element.source: Monstrous Compendium Volume Three: Minecraft Creatures

element.name: Blaze Rod
element.source: Monstrous Compendium Volume Three: Minecraft Creatures

description.p: The rod sheds dim light in a 5-foot radius. As an action, a creature can try to snap the rod, doing so with a successful DC 14 Strength check. The snapped rod releases its fiery energy in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 6 (1d12) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

element.name: End Crystal
element.source: Monstrous Compendium Volume Three: Minecraft Creatures

description.p: An End crystal is a Large object that has Armor Class 11; 30 hit points; vulnerability to bludgeoning and thunder damage; resistance to piercing and slashing damage; and immunity to poison and psychic damage. When a crystal is destroyed, it explodes in a 20-foot-radius sphere of destructive energy. Any creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

setters.set: dexterity, save, saving throw, force, damage

element.name: Ender Pearl
element.source: Monstrous Compendium Volume Three: Minecraft Creatures

description.p: A creature can throw the pearl up to 60 feet; if the pearl lands in an unoccupied space big enough to contain the creature, the creature teleports to that space, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, and the pearl disappears.

element.name: Pack Tactics
element.source: Monstrous Compendium Volume Three: Minecraft Creatures

description.p: The wolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolf’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn’t have the incapacitated condition.
